Name: 我是大官人
About the game: The game takes the Tang Dynasty as the era background, the protagonist incarnates the people of the Tang Dynasty to marry wives and concubines, marry children, recruit talents, deal with government affairs, business management, title worship king, alliance for supremacy, step by step on the peak of life. Original plot perfectly restore Tang Dynasty heyday elegant appearance, bid farewell to the boring brush monster upgrade, to a bureaucratic battle of intrigue! All kinds of beautiful women wait for you here; You can also buy VIPs to bring all the great names in history into your army! Accelerate the pace of upgrading!
Meta Title: 我是大官人: Sep 1, 2022, AnJianPeng and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on 我是大官人? Check out the release date (Sep 1, 2022), developer insights from AnJianPeng, and a complete game summary.
